tasks.title: Issue #287: Dual-mode spouse/child addition with duplicate detection
tasks.description: Enhance spouse and child addition UI to support both selecting existing people and creating new people on-the-fly, with intelligent duplicate detection safeguards.

subtasks.title: Add checkDuplicates GraphQL query
subtasks.description: Create query that searches for potential duplicate people by name (exact and Levenshtein similarity), birth year Â±2 years, same surname. Returns matches with matchReason field.

subtasks.title: Add createAndAddSpouse mutation
subtasks.description: Create mutation that creates a new person AND adds them as spouse in one transaction. Checks for duplicates first and returns duplicateWarnings array.

subtasks.title: Add createAndAddChild mutation
subtasks.description: Create mutation that creates a new person AND adds them as child in one transaction. Checks for duplicates first and returns duplicateWarnings array.

subtasks.title: Create ModeToggle component
subtasks.description: Reusable toggle component for switching between Search Existing and Create New modes.

subtasks.title: Create inline PersonForm component
subtasks.description: Compact form for Create New mode with fields: name_full, name_given, name_surname, sex, birth_year, birth_place, living.

subtasks.title: Create DuplicateWarningModal component
subtasks.description: Modal showing potential duplicate matches. Options: select existing person, create anyway, or cancel. Shows name, birth/death years, living status for each match.

subtasks.title: Update AddSpouseForm with dual-mode
subtasks.description: Update FamilyManagementNew AddSpouseForm section to use ModeToggle, PersonForm in Create mode, and DuplicateWarningModal before creation.

subtasks.title: Update AddChildForm with dual-mode
subtasks.description: Update FamilyManagementNew AddChildForm section to use ModeToggle, PersonForm in Create mode, and DuplicateWarningModal before creation.

subtasks.title: Add tests for duplicate detection
subtasks.description: Add unit tests for checkDuplicates query, createAndAddSpouse, createAndAddChild mutations, and DuplicateWarningModal component.
